Changelog

Source: NEWS.md

coronavirus 0.1.0.9002 Unreleased

  • Data changes:
    • coronavirus dataset - Change the structure of the US data from March 23rd 2020 and forward. The US data is now available on an agregated level. More information about the changes on the raw data available on this issue
    • coronavirus dataset - As of 2020-03-23, recovered cases were removed from the dataset
    • covid_south_korea - new dataset provide daily number of new cases by province for South Koria
    • covid_iran - new dataset provide daily number of new cases by province for Iran
  • Function:
    • update_datasets - enable to update the installed version with new data that available on the Github version

coronavirus 0.1.0 2020-02-23

  • Data updated up to Feb 13, 2020
  • Added a NEWS.md file to track changes to the package.
